DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Viagra is effective in treating erectile dysfunction and lower urinary tract symptoms in men affected by both conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Viagra in Men With ED and LUTS Due to Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia (BPH)
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of erectile dysfunction (ED) lower urinary tract symptoms (LUTS) previous prostate surgery or invasive intervention for BPH active urinary tract disease
